channel.title: 317 client problem
channel.description: hi i got a problem with my 317 client im trying to convert it to a 474 but i dont know how to make it load models above 20k someone help me please heres the problem: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 28150 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:121) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:4941) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:4937) at client.method105(client.java:7943) at client.method36(client.java:1411) at client.method102(client.java:7592) at client.method9(client.java:8527) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4263) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: 317 client problem
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

my method462 looks like this:

public static Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6 method462(int i, int j) { if(aClass21Array1661 == null) return null; Class21 class21 = aClass21Array1661[j]; if(i != 9) { for(int k = 1; k > 0; k++); } if(class21 == null) { aClass42_1662.method548(j); return null; } else { return new Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6(j, -870); } }
